document_data.name: Nesmorae
document_data.home:
[[Callidyrr]], [[Moonshae Isles]]
[[Waterdeep]], [[Sword Coast North]]It is unknown if Nesmorae hailed ''from'' Callidyrr or went ''to'' Callidyrr.
document_data.mainbody:
'''Nesmorae''' was a female [[human]] [[wizard]] living in [[Callidyrr]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

She was an apprentice of [[Kappiyan Flurmastyr]] of [[Waterdeep]] and was a notable sorceress and accomplished mage before the 1360s DR.
